Package sophiabcrypt.language

Class SbcDictionaryBase

java.lang.Object
sophiabcrypt.language.SbcDictionaryBase
public class SbcDictionaryBase
extends Object
This class is used to create "LanguageFile.xml" by default program sentences. If LanguageFile.xml do not exists, it's created, else, the file is updated
Since:
October/2018
Version:
1.03.1
Author:
CesarBianchi
See Also:
SbcDictionarySentence, SbcDictionaryTranslations

  • Method Details

    • CreateFileByDefault

      public void CreateFileByDefault​(String cLanguageFile) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Sets the language file name by default name, load default translations and make a new LanguageFile.xml
      Parameters:
      cLanguageFile - The name of the xml file language
      Throws:
      IOException - Case not possible write languagefile
      InterruptedException - Case not possible write languagefile
      Since:
      October/2018

    • LoadDefaultBase

      public void LoadDefaultBase()
      Sets the all default sentences and translations to make the LanguageFile.xml
      Since:
      October/2018

    • AddNewSentence

      private void AddNewSentence​(String cID, String className, String PT, String EN, String ES, String UD)
      Received by input params all sentence group data and call the method for add group to sentence List
      Parameters:
      cID - The Sentence ID
      className - Class name where the sentence is used
      PT - The translation of sentence in Portuguese Language
      EN - The translation of sentence in English Language
      ES - The translation of sentence in Spanish Language
      US - The translation of sentence in User Defined Language
      Since:
      October/2018

    • AddSentenceToList

      private void AddSentenceToList​(SbcDictionarySentence Sentence)
      Add a new sentence object to Sentence List
      Parameters:
      Sentence - The Sentence object with all data
      Since:
      October/2018

    • MakeLanguageFile

      public void MakeLanguageFile() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Create a new LanguageFile.xml from Sentence Object List
      Throws:
      IOException - Case fail during manage language file
      InterruptedException - Case fail during manage language file
      Since:
      October/2018

    • LoadLanguage

      public void LoadLanguage​(String cLanguageFile, String cLg) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      These method can be use for only read the file and load de sentences in memory for future use
      Parameters:
      cLanguageFile - The name of the xml file language
      cLg - The language choiced by user
      Throws:
      IOException - Case not possible write languagefile
      InterruptedException - Case not possible write languagefile
      Since:
      October/2018

    • LoadLanguageSentences

      public void LoadLanguageSentences() throws FileNotFoundException, IOException, InterruptedException
      Load a LanguageFile.xml to Memory for future use
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Case Language File doesn't exist
      IOException - Case not possible write languagefile
      InterruptedException - Case not possible write languagefile
      Since:
      October/2018

    • getTranslation

      public String getTranslation​(String cID, String cDefaultContent)
      Get a Translate from SentenceID, by according language defined by user
      Parameters:
      cID - The identifier of sentence searching
      cDefaultContent - The Default Content case cID does not exist
      Returns:
      The translation of SentenceID
      Since:
      October/2018

    • EraseFile

      public boolean EraseFile()

      Returns:
      true case sucessfully exclude
      Since:
      November/2018
